name: Le Mat Europe
memberOrga:
Le Mat Agenzia di sviluppo Italy www.lemat.it
Vagen Ut Consortium www.vagenut.coop
goal: Le Mat Europe is a European social franchising organization and a social co-operative participated by the Swedish Vagen Ut Consortium and the Italian Le Mat Consortium. The organization is inspired to create jobs for vulnerable groups of persons mainly in the sustainable tourism branch by managing hotels, hostels and B&Bs or other facilities. A brand and handbooks were developed and the organization supports the development and start-up of new Le Mat special places.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Le Mat Europe follows directly the Social Entrepreneurship Initiatives, the development of social economy and the job creation for vulnerable groups.
